MS MCQs

    Advanced event management features in Dynamics 365 Marketing

    »

    1. You want to pull a segment to send out marketing emails to waitlisted contacts for an event. What must be done first?

      You must create a static segment

      You must have your marketing page ID

      You must sync the Waitlist Item entity in Advanced Settings > Customer insights sync

      You must create a marketing list in Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement


    2. Which of the following is a true statement about passes?

      Passes must have an associated cost

      Passes can be associated with tracks

      You must associate passes to an event

      You can only set up one pass per event


    3. Each event template can hold all the same settings as a standard event including?

      Event link

      Event owner

      Event passes

      Event venues
